actionTemplate.title: Multi-tone concealer: correct then brighten
steps: Warm cream slightly; pick up tiny amounts with a small concealer brush.
Correct redness/blemishes with a green or neutral corrector; blend edges.
Brighten tear trough and hollows with a light neutral/peach concealer.
Add subtle contour with a deeper neutral shade; keep it soft.
For dark circles/dull spots: peach corrector first, then a brightener; press with sponge.

rationaleTemplate: Correcting first makes brightening look cleaner.
Small amounts prevent dryness and cracking.
